product_name: Pepper's Sabre Polarized Sunglasses - Matte Black Frame - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Good-looking shades at a killer price, the Pepper's Sabre Sunglasses use polarized lenses to reduce glare in bright light on your outdoor adventures. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement, for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Pepper's Sabre Polarized Sunglasses feature polarized blue mirror lenses with a brown tint. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: Good-looking shades at a killer price, the Pepper's Sabre Sunglasses use polarized lenses to reduce glare in bright light on your outdoor adventures.
